contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox football club| clubname = Xerez Football Club| image = [[File:Xerez FC.gif|center|150px|logo]] | fullname = Xerez Football Club| nickname = ''Xerecistas''| founded = 1907 | dissolved= 1946| ground = [[Estadio Domecq]],<br /> [[Jerez de la Frontera|Jerez]], [[Andalusia]],<br /> Spain | capacity = ¿? | chairman = | manager = | league = | season = | position = | pattern_la1=|pattern_b1=_unknown|pattern_ra1=| leftarm1=ffffff|body1=ffffff|rightarm1=ffffff|shorts1=ffffff|socks1=ffffff| }} '''Xerez Football Club''' was a [[Spanish football league teams|Spanish football team]] from [[Jerez de la Frontera]], [[Andalusia]], [[Spain]]. ==History== Founded in 1907, in 1933 is refounded, after the war was renamed '''Jerez Club de Fútbol'''. In 1947 '''Xerez FC''' and '''CD Jerez''' merged in [[Xerez CD]]. [[image:Jerez CF(Xerez FC).jpg|120px|left|thumb|Shield as Jerez CF]] ===Background=== ''Xerez Football Club'' - ''(1907–1946)'' → ↓ ::::::::''[[Xerez CD|Xerez Club Deportivo]]'' - ''(1947–)'' ''Club
